pullRequest.title: DEV-1420 Apply CMEK to patient report bucket
pullRequest.bodyText:
If the pipeline creates this bucket (as it is likely to do when we are
running Platinum) it will now check that a CMEK is specified and apply
it to the new bucket.

commit.message:
DEV-1420 Apply CMEK to patient report bucket

If the pipeline creates this bucket (as it is likely to do when we are
running Platinum) it will now check that a CMEK is specified and apply
it to the new bucket.

nodes.bodyText: I don't think its actually possible for cmek to be empty, its a mandatory argument now.
